title: How to Check an AutoCAD Serial Number and Product Key

steps.title: Check your email for a message from Autodesk.
steps.content: Check your email for a message from Autodesk. If you downloaded your AutoCAD product or purchased it from the Autodesk eStore, you can find the serial number and product key in the email from Autodesk. This email may be titled "Fulfillment Notification." [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go to https://manage.autodesk.com/ and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://manage.autodesk.com/ and sign in. You can use any web browser on your computer to access your Autodesk account and find your AutoCAD serial number. [2] X Research source Most people will use this method to check their AutoCAD serial number; this method is for singular entities using the software.

steps.title: Click Products & Services.
steps.content: Click Products & Services . This is at the top of the screen, next to the Home tab.

steps.title: Click View details next to the desired product.
steps.content: Click View details next to the desired product. This will expand the product details, which includes your product's serial number and product key. [3] X Research source If there is no View details button, your product doesn't have a serial number.

steps.title: Go to https://manage.autodesk.com/ and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://manage.autodesk.com/ and sign in. You can use any web browser on your computer to access your Autodesk account and find your AutoCAD serial number. You should use this method if you're a software coordinator or contract manager and have a contract number instead of a single copy of AutoCAD.

steps.title: Click the Contracts and Orders tab.
steps.content: Click the Contracts and Orders tab. You'll see this in the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Select the contract number.
steps.content: Select the contract number. A detailed list will appear and show you the serial numbers and product keys for the contract number you selected. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go to https://www.autodesk.com/education/home and log in (if you aren't).
steps.content: Go to https://www.autodesk.com/education/home and log in (if you aren't). You can use any web browser on your computer to access your Autodesk and Education Community account and find your AutoCAD serial number. If you downloaded the student software via the Install Now method, you should use this method.

steps.title: Click the My Account button.
steps.content: Click the My Account button. It's on the right side of your screen. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click your profile picture in the upper-right corner of the screen.
steps.content: Click your profile picture in the upper-right corner of the screen. You may see your initials or an icon of a person if you don't have a profile picture.

steps.title: Click All Products & Services.
steps.content: Click All Products & Services . It's on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Click Content Type and select Serial Number.
steps.content: Click Content Type and select Serial Number . The serial number for the AutoCAD subscription will display. [6] X Research source
